SELECT N.RNUM, N.NO, N.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, N.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, N.CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.NO, M.NAME , M.TITLE , M.START_DATE, M.END_DATE, M.SCHEDULE_FLAG , M.CREATED_DATE, M.CODE FROM( SELECT N.NO, NC.NAME, N.TITLE, N.START_DATE, N.END_DATE, NC.SCHEDULE_FLAG , N.CREATED_DATE, NC.CODE FROM NOTICE N JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY NC ON N.CATEGORY_CODE = NC.CODE
ORDER BY NO DESC ) M ) N WHERE N.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
